pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compute FAB (Frequentist and Bayes) Conformal Prediction Intervals // Computes and plots prediction intervals for numerical data or prediction sets for categorical data using prior information. Empirical Bayes procedures to estimate the prior information from multi-group data are included. See, e.g.,Bersson and Hoff (2022) arXiv:2204.08122 "Optimal Conformal Prediction for Small Areas".
